dgantt
Class GanttModel

java.lang.Object
  dgantt.GanttModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicGanttModel
public abstract class GanttModel
extends java.lang.Object

Model storing the collection of tasks displayed in the Gantt chart.

Constructor Summary

          Default constructor for a Gantt model.

Method Detail

addGanttModelListener

public void addGanttModelListener(GanttModelListener listener)
Registers the specified GanttModelListener to receive events from this Gantt model.

Parameters:
listener - the GanttModelListener to receive events from this Gantt model

addTask

public void addTask(java.lang.Object task)
Adds a new task to this Gantt model. The default implementation is read-only.

Parameters:
task - the new task

fireGanttModelChanged

public void fireGanttModelChanged()
Notifies all registered GanttModelListeners that this model has been changed.

fireGanttModelChanged

public void fireGanttModelChanged(GanttModelEvent event)
Invokes the GanttModelListener.ganttModelChanged(GanttModelEvent) method on all registered GanttModelListeners.

Parameters:
event - the event

fireGanttModelChanged

public void fireGanttModelChanged(int row)
Notifies all registered GanttModelListeners that the specified row has been changed.

Parameters:
row - the index of the changed row

fireGanttModelChanged

public void fireGanttModelChanged(int firstRow,
                                  int lastRow)
Notifies all registered GanttModelListeners that the specified rows have been changed.

Parameters:
firstRow - the index of the first changed row
lastRow - the index of the last changed row

Returns the number of tasks contained in this Gantt chart.

removeGanttModelListener

public void removeGanttModelListener(GanttModelListener listener)
Unregisters the specified GanttModelListener to no longer receive events from this Gantt model.

Parameters:
listener - the GanttModelListener to no longer receive events from this Gantt model

removeTask

public void removeTask(java.lang.Object task)
Removes the specified task from this Gantt model. The default implementation is read-only.

Parameters:
task - the task to remove
